article_title: Hamas-run health ministry says over 100 killed since ceasefire ended.
sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  in  Gaza  says  109  people  have  been  killed  since  the  temporary  ceasefire  expired  this  morning.

article_title: Hamas-run health ministry says over 100 killed since ceasefire ended.
sentence: In  total  more  than  14,800  people  have  been  killed,  including  about  6,000  children,  since  Israel  began  its  campaign  against  Hamas  in  Gaza  in  retaliation  for  the  7  October  attacks.
